title: Survival Tools V1
description: Survival Tools V1 you can pick-up objects (food,water,medkit)...
longDescription:
Survival Tools V1

Classic Inventory system you can pick-up objects (food,water,medkit) and use them also you can destroy items in inventory.

you can control max picked items (bag size)

Using Survival Tools v1 we can easly and fast make interaction on any objects. You can inplement Survival Tools v1 in [Natural Movement] or in any first person project

Survival Tools V1 [Demonstation]

Survival Tools V1 [Setup]

Survival Tools V1 [Support]

Documentation: everything commented in project
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Pick-up items
  • Destroy items in inventory
  • Use Items (medkit,water,food)
  • Control Bag Size
  • Survival Mechanic (Hunger,Thirst,Health)


Number of Blueprints: 6

Input: (Keyboard and Mouse]

Network Replicated: (No]

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: [Yes]

Mac: [No]
